channel.title: Custom Server Base V1
channel.description:
hello this is me custom base i made this from scratch its a good source to make your server from this
includes: File, Size, Includes
client.java 12kb sendmessage etc Cryption.java 5kb same as others Item.java 6kb item handling Misc.java 4kb printins etc Npc.java 5kb npc handling NPCHandler.java 11kb npc handling NPCList.java 1kb npc handling Player.java 20kb player handling PlayerHandler.java 7kb player handling PlayerSave.java 2kb playersaving server.java 3kb same as others stream.java 11kb same as others (+ a fixed crash!) ________________________________________________ Total Kb(extracted) 84,3kb Total Kb (rar file) 23.14
download: http://files.filefront.com/custom+ba.../fileinfo.html
plz post if u download or link wil deleted
This can be cleaned more i wanna get a cleaner base if u cleaned the server and wanna share whith me ***++ of course
Have fun!
Credits: ME!! ;D

item.title: Custom Server Base V1
item.dc:creator: @nick888 nick888
item.description:
@nick888 wrote:

hello this is me custom base i made this from scratch its a good source to make your server from this

includes:
File, Size, Includes

client.java 12kb sendmessage etc
Cryption.java 5kb same as others
Item.java 6kb item handling
Misc.java 4kb printins etc
Npc.java 5kb npc handling
NPCHandler.java 11kb npc handling
NPCList.java 1kb npc handling
Player.java 20kb player handling
PlayerHandler.java 7kb player handling
PlayerSave.java 2kb playersaving
server.java 3kb same as others
stream.java 11kb same as others (+ a fixed crash!)

Total Kb(extracted) 84,3kb
Total Kb (rar file) 23.14

download: http://files.filefront.com/custom+ba.../fileinfo.html

plz post if u download or link wil deleted

This can be cleaned more i wanna get a cleaner base if u cleaned the server and wanna share whith me ***++ of course

Have fun!

Credits:
ME!! ;D
